message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. I'm asking for $12,000 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in between these prices?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. I could potentially come down to $11,000, but that's my absolute limit.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to lower the price. However, I am still unable to go above $10,000 for the product. Could we possibly meet at $9,500?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I can't go as low as $9,500.  I know this product is worth at least $10,000 to you, so how about we split the difference and settle at $10,500?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I am still not able to go above $10,000. Could we possibly agree on $10,000?
